com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence

Class Offset

  • Object
    • com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.Offset
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Offset.NoOffset, Offset.Sequence, Offset.TimeBasedUUID

    public abstract class Offset
extends Object
    An offset. Offsets are used for ordering of events, typically in event journals, so that consumers can keep track of what events they have and haven't consumed. Akka persistence, which underlies Lagom's persistence APIs, uses different offset types for different persistence datastores. This class provides an abstraction over them. The two types currently supported are a long sequence number and a time based UUID.
